name: Benjamin_Franklin
text:
Benjamin Franklin
Benjamin Franklin was a high-ranking Mason and founder of the American Philosophical Society.
In a rambling 1805 letter to Thomas Jefferson, Meriwether Lewis spoke of a "mysterious force B. Franklin had stumbled upon."
Mr. Cooper considered Franklin as one of his heroes and kept a picture of him above the door of his print shop.
Behind the scenes
Benjamin Franklin (January 17, 1706 – April 17, 1790) was one of the Founding Fathers of the United States, also notable for his major discoveries in physical science.
